articles.title: Study Reveals Dopamine’s Limited Role in Rapid Neural Activity - Neuroscience News
articles.description: A recent study has found that dopamine signals have a minimal impact on rapid neural activity in the striatum, challenging existing theories about dopamine's role in brain signaling.
